Text:
You've finally got the right look. That marks the
conclusion of all the special training!

...Lady Alpha, well done. I apologize for the many
indignities...even if it was for the sake of training.

No, I appreciate it. Thanks to you, I can now stand
before him with confidence.

Lady Alpha. I've arranged for Master Shadow to come
to Alexandria.

I've tightened the security outside the room to
ensure there are no disturbances. Rest assured,
we won't eavesdrop, so please don't worry.

That's about all we can do. We wish you the best of
luck this time around!

All of you...thank you for everything. I'm
determined to see this through, to honor
your efforts as well.
Yes, I promise...!
Both Master Shadow and Lady Alpha have entered.

Now we just have to guard this place. I'm a little
curious about what's happening inside, though.

She'll give him the chocolates once they're alone...
That's the meat and potatoes of this plan. Hopefully,
Master Shadow will—
Boss man is eating meat and potatoes?

No, not literally, we were just talking about
the plan—
...Huh?! Whose voice was that...?

I wanna eat meat and potatoes with Boss man too!
I'm so hungry!
(...This is bad.)

If Lady Delta enters now, the entire plan will be
ruined!
But we can't match her strength...

We need to somehow convince her to leave
peacefully...!

How're we supposed to do that? She's not exactly
someone who listens to reason...

*sniff sniff* I don't smell meat and potatoes. But I
do smell Lady Alpha. Is she with Boss man?

...Yes. Lady Alpha is inside. They are having an
important discussion, so I must regretfully ask
that you return at a later time.
Huh?! Did Lady Alpha say I can't enter?
W-Well...

Technically, Lady Alpha didn't order us to not let
anyone enter.

She may not have explicitly ordered it, but...after
all the support we've given, we can't let her down
at the very last moment...!
If it's not a "no," then it's a "yes"!

P-Please wait! I apologize, but this time, I cannot
permit it, even if it's you, Lady Delta!
You're going to stand in my way?

Yes, I will not allow anyone to pass. This is not
just a matter of duty...but my own will!
Alright... Let's play!
Urk...! Lady Delta's aura has changed...!

But we can't back down now... Looks like we have no
choice but to fight.

If the four of us work together, we might be able to
buy some time. Let's hope things go well inside in
the meantime.

Are you all really serious? Taking on one of the
Seven Shadows, especially one who specializes in
combat, do you realize how crazy that sounds?
But we're doing it, right?

Hahah. Totally. Looks like we've all been caught up
in the Valentine's Day spirit.
...Here she comes! Get ready to intercept!

Thank you for coming today. I bet you were surprised
for me to ask you here out of the blue?

I'm kind of used to it. You've been asking me to
meet you a lot lately.
R-Right... So, um, today...
(Why...? Why am I struggling to speak properly...?)

(All that special training will go to waste if I
don't give him the chocolates in the perfect
way...!)
Cid. I have something for you—
...Isn't it kinda noisy outside?
Huh? Now that you mention it—
Aagh...?!
La-Lambda?!

The door just flew open. You all look beat up...
What's going on?
Agh... She's too strong...!
*huff, huff* So much for buying time...
A-All of you...!

I'm sorry, Lady Alpha... We were no match for
Lady Delta...
Hehe! What weaklings!
Delta, you're here too... What in the world...?

Hey, Lady Alpha! Are you hogging Boss man all to
yourself? That's not fair!

(I'm not sure what's happening, but I can't just
stand by and let Delta do this...)
Everyone, step back.

I-I can still fight! As an instructor, I must see it
through to the end...!
Lambda... Alright. Let's stop Delta together!
...Uh, what's going on here?
